name: Anthell
description:
Submitted for the LowRezJam 2022.

Some pesky ants have gone and infested your grounds, so you take the only reasonable course of action: investing in a flamethrower to really show those pests!

Your goal is to exterminate all the ants in each level while keeping as much of your land intact as possible. Beware, though, as your flamethrower burns the ground as well.

Controls:

  • AD - Move left/right
  • W/Space - Jump or climb
  • S/LMB - Flamethrower
  • Up/Down - Volume
